verses.name: Matthew 19:12
verses.text: For there are some eunuchs, which were so born from their mother’s womb: and there are some eunuchs, which were made eunuchs of men: and there be eunuchs, which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven’s sake. He that is able to receive it, let him receive it.

verses.name: Matthew 19:13
verses.text: Then were there brought unto him little children, that he should put his hands on them, and pray: and the disciples rebuked them.

verses.name: Matthew 19:14
verses.text: But Jesus said, Suffer little children, and forbid them not, to come unto me: for of such is the kingdom of heaven.
